Subject: Discovery 
production 
Date: Tue, 30 Jul 2019 17:08:02 +0000 
All, 
Our first discovery production will include approximately 12 GB of data. As a result, we need to request that you please 
provide us with a drive (or drives if you would like multiple copies) on which to load the discovery for you. You can either 
bring the drive(s) to tomorrow's conference, or you can send them to our office at the below address to my attention. 
Once we receive a drive (or drives) from you, we will get it loaded and sent back out to you as quickly as possible. 
Additionally, if you would like Mr. Epstein to receive his own electronic copy of the discovery to review at the MCC, please 
provide us with a hard drive (not a thumb driveâ€”the MCC will only accept external hard drives) for us to load and send to 
the MCC for his review. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1 St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00014534
